Nova Adria? Samo v prvem letu z ogromno izgubo
Zaposlovala bi okoli 200 ljudi.
07 Nov 2019, 16:32 by T. V.
LJUBLJANA – Družba za upravljanje terjatev bank (DUTB) je nekdanjim pilotom Adrie Airways predstavila poslovni načrt nove slovenske letalske družbe, je poročal Radio Slovenija. En mesec po stečaju Adrie so na slabi banki potekale prve predstavitve projekta morebitne ustanovitve nove letalske družbe. Vlada je slabi banki namreč zaupala preverjanje možnosti ustanovitve novega nacionalnega letalskega prevoznika. Družba bi sprva letela s petimi Canadairovimi letali, zaposlila bi do 200 ljudi, zaradi vzpostavitve celotne letalske operacije pa bi prvo leto sklenila z 20 milijoni evrov izgube, je neuradno izvedel Radio Slovenija.Če bi ideja o ustanovitvi novega prevoznika dobila zeleno luč, bi ustanovitelj – domnevno DUTB v sodelovanju s partnerjem – do vsega, kar potrebuje za zagon, najlažje in najhitreje prišel z nakupom tako imenovane Adrijine poslovne celote, ki je na voljo v stečajni masi, je še poročal nacionalni radio.Na ministrstvu za gospodarski razvoj in tehnologijo so za STA povedali, da od DUTB še niso prejeli izračunov o morebitni ustanovitvi novega letalskega prevoznika.

New Adria? Only in the first year with a huge loss
It would employ about 200 people.
07 Nov 2019, 16:32 by T.V.
LJUBLJANA - Bank Receivables Management Company (BAMC) presented former pilots of Adria Airways with the business plan of a new Slovenian airline, Radio Slovenia reported. One month after the bankruptcy of Adria, the first bank presented the project of the possible creation of a new airline at a bad bank. The government has entrusted the bad bank with checking the possibility of establishing a new national air carrier. The company would initially fly five Canadair planes, employ up to 200 people, and with the establishment of the entire aviation operation would conclude the first year with a loss of 20 million euros, Radio Slovenia informally informed. - Allegedly, BAMC in cooperation with a partner - the easiest and fastest way to get started was by buying the so-called Adria business unit, which is available in bankruptcy mass, national radio reported. The Ministry of Economic Development and Technology has STA was told that BAMC had not yet received calculations on the possible creation of a new air carrier.
